body:
# Introduction
Tealeaf is a simplistic mvc framework written to work with Sinatra. It features:
* A clean design
* A configurable architecture
* Easy to use routing


## Grabbing the code
You can always fork the project, and then send a pull request. You can clone the project too:

`
$ git clone https://github.com/Jinz0/TeaLeaf.git
`
tagline: A simple MVC framework written in Ruby, designed to work with Sinatra.
name: Tealeaf
